name: Save The Toast!
description:
Flappy bird has nothing on this toast-chomping monster!

Hone in your skills and take the toast challenge!

Help this little toast monster find his toast!
Fun for the whole family!

This game includes 10 levels of action-packed adventure! Play in the bright happy sun, as well as a cloudy rainy day.

Change the weather as the decade, because "Save the Toast" Now includes 3 never before seen Vintage levels.

-BLACK AND WHITE
-1970
-TOAST A HIPSTER

#savethetoast
https://www.facebook.com/henrysorrengames
